turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order an espresso from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, did you want just a plain espresso?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I wanted a caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size did you want that drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want it iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A hot, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: were you okay with whole milk, or did you want another milk type?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want soy milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. did u need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that is all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the Starbucks at Galleria mall in Houston, Texas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i submitted your order. it'll b ready for pick up in 10 mins. the receipt has also been sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need my help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that is all. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, take care.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You too, bye.
